key_characteristics: Flat color blocking with minimal gradients
Strong geometric shapes and simplified forms
Muted earth tones with occasional bright accents
High contrast between figure and ground

permutation_batches.prompt: {mountain peak, mountain range, alpine valley, rocky cliff, snow-capped summit} with {at sunrise, at sunset, under cloudy sky, in golden hour, at dusk, in morning mist, under clear sky, during storm} --sref 1234567890
permutation_batches.notes: Focus on dramatic lighting conditions to test style consistency

permutation_batches.prompt: {classic car, vintage van, retro motorcycle, old pickup truck, station wagon} with {parked in forest, on desert road, by the ocean, in mountain setting, at campsite, on country road, in national park, near lake} --sref 1234567890
permutation_batches.notes: Vehicles are a strong fit for this retro aesthetic

permutation_batches.prompt: {tent in wilderness, campfire scene, hiking trail, canoe on lake, backpack on rock, camping gear layout, hammock between trees, fishing by river} with {at dawn, at dusk, in afternoon sun, under starry sky, in morning light} --sref 1234567890
permutation_batches.notes: Core theme that aligns perfectly with the style

recommended_additions: Time of day variations (sunrise, sunset, golden hour)
Lighting directions (backlit, side lit, soft light)
